title: Ticket #3026: JobRouter should issue a reschedule command
description:
The JobRouter provides a poor latency compared to a direct "condor_submit" because it does not issue a reschedule command after routing jobs.

Hence, we have to wait for the schedd interval for a grid_manager to start up, which typically takes 5 minutes.

This makes test jobs seem like they take forever, at least in the user's eyes.
remarks:
